name: Scottish Ale - 12 x 473 ml
description: A rich, malty Scottish Ale with deep caramel notes, subtle toffee sweetness, and a gentle roasted finish. Smooth and full-bodied, it boasts velvety malt depth and a balanced hop presence, capturing the hearty, comforting essence of traditional Scottish brewing. Cheers ! 12 x 473 ml Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Oktoberfest - 12 x 473 ml
description: Raise a stein to tradition with this rich dark M√§rzen, an Oktoberfest classic reborn. Deep amber hues, smooth toasted malts and a hint of caramel warmth deliver festive flavour in every sip. Clean, balanced and full of character, it‚Äôs the perfect companion for hearty and autumn celebrations. Prost! 12 x 473 ml Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Blueberry Wit - 12 x 473 ml - Limited Edition
description: Crafted with blueberries picked at the peak of the season, this Blueberry Wit bursts with fresh, juicy flavour. Each sip showcases the natural sweetness and gentle tartness of sun-ripened fruit, carried by a smooth wheat body. Light, crisp, and refreshing‚Äîit‚Äôs summer in a glass, any time of year. Our second release of our NEW Experimental Brews! A Limited Edition series. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Orange Radler - 12 x 473 ml - Limited Edition
description: Brewed with care and real citrus our Radler blends orange, pink grapefruit and blood orange for a refreshingly balanced sip. Bright, juicy and expertly crafter, it's a small-batch twist on a classic thirst-quencher. The very #1 first release in our NEW Experimental Brews! A Limited Edition series. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Mexican Lager - 12 x 473ml
description: New can design! Crisp and light, this Mexican Lager is sunshine in a can. Perfectly refreshing and effortlessly smooth it's made for every moment that calls for a cold one. Crack open, drop in a wedge of lime, and with one sip, you'll feel like you're on vacation. ‚òÄÔ∏è Cheers! 12 x 473 ml

name: Non-alcoholic - Hazy DDH IPA - Discovery Series - Limited Edition
description: After great success as a limited edition, we‚Äôre excited to announce this brew is now part of our regular collection! Our brewers were excited to use experimental hops #06297, known as lotus hops. The orange and vanilla notes from our carefully selected hops combined with the silkiness of the oats used in the mash create a velvety, Hazy IPA, reminiscent of a vanilla orange creamsicleüçäüç¶ Double Dry Hopped beers have been dry-hopped twice during the fermentation process, increasing the complex aromas, our experience of the beer's flavour is enhanced. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten, Lactose Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Non-alcoholic - Black IPA - Limited Edition
description: Your eyes will see a stout, your nose will smell the hops of an IPA and your palate taste dark malts and citrusy hops. Your taste buds will be pleasantly surprised! In this Black IPA, the citrusy hops shine and break through delicate dark malt notes to create an intriguing combination. We decided to let our brewers have some fun with this new serie. Each of these small-batch brews will use less common styles, hops, and malts for you to discover! Cheers!! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Non-alcoholic - Craft Cider
description: Our dry cider comes from carefully selecting apples whose juice is fermented respecting classic techniques. Using the most advanced technology, we dealcoholize our cider, removing the alcohol but keeping the flavor you love. The result is a balanced, crisp, refreshing, slightly effervescent dealcoholize cider. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Gluten Free Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Non-alcoholic - West coast IPA - Craft Beer
description: Loaded whit hops, this floral West Coast style IPA offers notes of tropical fruit and citrus. Its sustained and balanced bitterness allows for a crisp finish that will have you coming back for more. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Blonde Ale - Non-Alcoholic - Craft Beer
description: Sometimes you just want to kick back, relax, and enjoy an easy drinking beer with a little edge. With accents of malt and a light hop finish, our golden ale is crisp and refreshing. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Irish Red Ale - Non-Alcoholic - Craft Beer
description: Brewed in the Irish style with Windsor yeast, you'll first notice the malt-focused aromas of this medium-bodied ale. The roasted barley translates into subtle notes of coffee and caramel. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Wheat Beer - Non-Alcoholic - Craft Beer
description: This flavourful Belgian-style white offers balanced aromas of orange, coriander, and wheat. Its rich and hazy body will surely please beer lovers. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Raspberry Sour - 12 x 473ml
description: Our Raspberry Sour is a complex and refreshing blend of tart and fruity flavours.The initial taste is a burst of fresh raspberry, followed by a sour and tangy kick. Let thefruity aroma and playfull effervescence ignite your taste buds and leave you comingback for more. Made with natural ingredients: each can contains 18g of fresh raspberry puree Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Organic Session IPA - Non-Alcoholic - Craft Beer
description: Galaxy hops are known for their exceptionally bright and tropical flavor and that's exactly what you'll get with our organic session IPA. An intense aromatic profile whit a moderately bitter finish. Cheers! 12 x 473 ml Contains: Gluten Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.

name: Organic Blonde Pilsner - 24 x 355ml
description: 6x 4-pack of 355ml - New Format! This Organic Pilsner is crisp andd refreshing. It boasts a clean and balanced taste with a subtle hop bitterness, making it a classic choice for beer enthusiasts. It's light, effervescent body and mild malt sweetness create delightful, easy-drinking experience. Cheers! Less than 0,5% Alc/Vol.
